sentences.en: A: I know and I do yearn for faster downloads.
sentences.cn: 我知道,我的确渴望更快下载.

sentences.en: Above all it will make you yearn for Rowling's next instalment.
sentences.cn: 更甚者,它将会让你更渴望罗琳的下一本连载.

sentences.en: Do not yearn in desire toward it , but wait till it reaches you.
sentences.cn: 你不能欲望中烧,按捺不住, 只能静候它的到来.

sentences.en: I know and I do yearn for faster downloads.
sentences.cn: 我知道,我也渴望更快的下载速度.

sentences.en: If you do yearn for chocolate, try a carob bar instead.
sentences.cn: 你要是非常想吃巧克力，那就嚼根角豆条解馋吧。

sentences.en: In our eyes, sea is forever mysterious and make human yearn.
sentences.cn: 在我们的眼里, 大海永远那么神秘,另人向往.

sentences.en: Is it not in the nature of all human beings to yearn for freedom?
sentences.cn: 渴望自由不是人类的天性 吗 ?

sentences.en: Many people living in big cities yearn for an idyllic country life.
sentences.cn: 现在的很多都市人向往那种田园化的生活.

sentences.en: Most of younger yearn for beyond they parents control.
sentences.cn: 大部分的年轻人都渴望脱离父母的控制.

sentences.en: Now put it a different way: What do I yearn for?
sentences.cn: 然后用不同的话说: 我渴求什么?

sentences.en: Peddle sometimes pleasant , stop and yearn after solicitting many people.
sentences.cn: 叫卖声时而入耳,招揽了不少人驻足留恋.

sentences.en: The more the worms writhe, the more I yearn to crush out their entrails!
sentences.cn: 虫子越受苦, 我就越想碾碎它们.

sentences.en: We appreciate the common festivals each other with admiration and yearn.
sentences.cn: 我们赞赏的共同节日互相钦佩和向往.

sentences.en: We yearn to surrender our entire being.
sentences.cn: 我们渴望着放纵我们整个的生命.

sentences.en: Yearn to understand first and to be understood second.

trans.tran_en: to have a strong desire for something, especially something that is difficult or impossible to get
